channel.title: Pk-X is Back! | #1 Spawn | Amazing Combat | Best Server For Hybriding
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://pk-x.com/img/advpkx.png[/img]
[B]Website[/B] [url=http://pk-x.com]http://pk-x.com[/url] [B]Webclient[/B] [url=http://pk-x.com/play.php]http://pk-x.com/play.php[/url] [B]Desktop Client[/B] [url=http://pk-x.com/download.php]http://pk-x.com/download.php[/url]
[B]Some features listed:[/B]
- Perfect combat, we guarantee that this server is best for the hybrids! - Perfect item switching - Login & Pk - Bounty hunter target system - Windows, Mac & Linux compatible client - Spawning - Automatic rewards for donations & votes - Amazing summoning - Advanced clan chat system - Online 24/7 without lagg
[B]Why play Pk-X?[/B]
Pk-X is a friendly community with caring staff team, as member of Pk-X you're benefited to enjoy new updates weekly in-game. Pk-X is definetly based on pking, you can choose to play with pure or master account or choose your stats by yourself! Most of the items on Pk-X are spawnable, but we have a lot items that need to be gained by pking. As pking server, we have very good combat which make's us unique as runescape private server. Our combat permits you to pk anyhow you want! Want to hybrid, nhbrid or just do normal fights? - You can definetly do that all on Pk-X! Hope to see you in-game!
[B]Media:[/B]
[IMG]http://pk-x.com/img/1.png[/img] [IMG]http://pk-x.com/img/2.png[/img] [IMG]http://pk-x.com/img/4.png[/img] [IMG]http://pk-x.com/img/shop.png[/img][IMG]http://pk-x.com/img/pkpic.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: Pk-X is Back! | #1 Spawn | Amazing Combat | Best Server For Hybriding
item.dc:creator: @PkFactory PkFactory
item.description:
@PkFactory wrote:

liamp:

how many pkp per kill because if its like a stupid number like 8 - 10 etc will take a long time to get d claws etc wouldn’t be worth it

8-16, you can’t currently buy claws with pkp anymore. Ags is 2500pkp.

I will update picture for pkp shop asap.
